Class: Delete

Delete

new Delete(imagerInstance, options)

This plugin provides a button that will remove image & editing controls from it.
Parameters:
Name Type Description
imagerInstance ImagerJs
options Object
Properties
Name Type Attributes Default Description
fullRemove boolean <optional>
 false Whether to fully remove imager. If true, everything will be removed from DOM. If false, a selector for new image will be left
